title: Advanced Backend Programming with Java
organization: Mentorship by Ilkin Mehdiyev (Senior Software Engineer)
description: Selected for an exclusive, 9-month intensive mentorship program focused on professional backend engineering. Under the guidance of Senior Engineer Ilkin Mehdiyev, mastered Java Fundamentals and Advanced Java programming. The program specialized in Spring Boot development, covering industry-standard practices for building robust and scalable APIs. Emphasized clean code principles, effective backend architecture, and real-world problem-solving. Participated in high-level technical discussions and collaborative learning within a select group of high-potential developers.
